title: FS: T206 Piedmont 42 and Lenox - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Piedmont 42 and Lenox - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell Oldring (Lenox) and Joss (Piedmont 42) for $200 each or $375 for the pair.  Price includes delivery (insured).

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100021/lenox/web.jpg?ver=12910474640001[/IMG]

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100021/joss42/web.jpg?ver=12914404770001[/IMG]
ill take them both. i pm'd you.
